title: Fragment, 1920s or 1930s
medium:
Medium: silk, cotton
Technique: supplementary warps in a twill foundation (velvet).  Signs of age created by controlled 'breaks' and by a weft of uneven thickness.
dimensions: Warp x Weft: 69 x 67 cm (27 3/16 x 26 3/8 in.)
creditline: Gift of Mrs. R. Curt Hasenclever
description: Unpatterned, deep red velvet with woven "antique" spots to simulate age.
